>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.themes.Item.17sO1sZcTu5bZPSF]{Scholar}

To you, learning and absorbing knowledge related to your field of expertise is as refreshing as drinking from a cool spring in the middle of a desert planet. Up to twice per day, when in a situation where information from your specialty field could be useful (at the GM’s discretion), you can spend 10 minutes in deep contemplation and research of your specialty field and recover 1 Resolve Point, in addition to using @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.VWJLbwCeu7DsunHk]{recall knowledge} (see page 133) for the information you seek; this doesn’t count as resting to regain Stamina Points.
